tooltips.calendarEntityTypes: For type recognizing event name has to start from identification label. Label for default entity can be empty. Recommendation: Do not change identification labels after you saved sync setting

tooltips.calendarDontPushPastEvents: If checked, only recently created events will be pushed to Outlook.
